page.title: 12Marshland Weather
page.content: The weather on the levels is constantly changing.It seems unpredictable, even by weathermen.There is quite often some low cloud causing dull weather ,but of course you always get the occasional stream of sunshine from the heavens.The wind on the flatlands is strong as there aren't many tall trees to shelter you.It is quite dangerous to be out walking on the marshes in a storm as you are very likely to be struck by lightning and seriously injured.In winter the snowy gales whip you and dark clouds spread a feeling of depression over the land and the marshes look cold and unwelcome but as spring sets in beauty returns, getting ready for the hot summer.
